briefTitle: Physical Exercise in the Quality of Life and Physical Fitness of Elderly Women With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Comparison of the Effect of Two Household Physical Exercise Protocols in the Quality of Life and Physical Fitness of Elderly Women With Breast Cancer in Hormoniotherapy Treatment: Interventional Study

primaryOutcomeMeasure: Variation in the performance of Lift and Sitting Test
